title: Aside from bans, ARAM champion select needs 1 more thing.
body:
A 10 second timer after the end of the initial timer ( similar to blind pick )

Why? So that guy who gave you heimerdinger last second can switch his runes & masteries and so can you.

During this 10 second period, trading should not work.

replies.body: Then remove 20 seconds off the beginning of champ select, because people already have way too much fucking time to decide to dodge.
